name: efjson
description: a streaming and event-driven JSON parser (with support for JSON5 and JSONC)
author: Jin Cai

scripts.build_cjs: tsc efjson.ts --target es6 --module commonjs --outDir dist && uglifyjs -c -m --mangle-props regex=/^_/ --output dist/efjson.min.cjs dist/efjson.js --wrap efjson
scripts.build_mjs: tsc efjson.ts --target es6 --outDir dist && uglifyjs -c -m --mangle-props regex=/^_/ --output dist/efjson.min.mjs dist/efjson.js --module
